English:
Whenever a unit dies on the field, gain an additional stack. 
When an ally's HP is reduced due to Pain damage, they take &b damage and lose 1 stack.
Chinese:
每当场上有单位死亡时，额外叠加一层
队员因受到痛苦伤害导致体力值减少时，受到&b点伤害并减少一层

English:
Using a skill deals 10% ATK as Pain damage to all enemies. 
Removed at the end of the turn, dealing 30% ATK as Pain damage to all enemies.
Chinese:
使用技能对所有敌人造成10%攻击力的痛苦伤害
回合结束时解除，并对所有敌人造成30%攻击力的痛苦伤害

English:
After taking damage, if HP is below 1, set it to 1. 
When this buff ends, immediately enter Substitute.
Chinese:
受到伤害后，若生命值低于1，将其变为1
Buff结束时立刻进入替身

English:
Whenever an ally's HP changes, take 30% damage. 
If the change was caused by Pain damage, take 90% damage instead. 
Whenever a unit dies on the field, take 100% damage. 
When HP is below 20%, immediately take 200% damage and remove this buff.
Chinese:
每当队员的体力值发生变动时，受到30%倍率伤害。
若此次变动原因是受到痛苦伤害，改为受到90%倍率伤害。
每当场上有单位死亡时，受到100%倍率伤害。
血量低于20%时，立即受到200%倍率点伤害并解除此buff

English: When using a skill from hand, take 3 Pain damage.
Chinese: 从手中使用技能时，受到3点痛苦伤害

English:
Attacks apply 1 stack of Hunt. 
Maximum Hunt stacks increased to 6.
Chinese:
攻击附带一层“追猎”
追猎的最大层数改为6

English: When HP is below 0 and a skill is used, heal HP equal to 50% of ATK.
Chinese: 血量低于0时释放技能时，恢复自身攻击力50%倍率的生命值

English: If you call my combat style madness... I'll take it as a compliment.
Chinese: 如果你说我的战斗方式疯狂......我会认为这是一种褒奖。

English: Once per turn, when receiving fatal damage, if not in Substitute state, heal all HP, clear all debuffs, enter Substitute state, and apply 1 stack of Hunt to all enemies.
Chinese: 每回合限1次，当受到致命伤害时，若自身不处于替身状态，回复所有生命值，清除所有debuff，进入替身状态，并为所有敌人添加一层追猎。

English:
A "Hunter" wielding a circular saw, though in this era, hunting seems unnecessary. Possesses a "Substitute" to disengage in combat, adapting to different battlefield scenarios. 
She calls herself "Specter", exhibiting astonishing destructiveness and outstanding combat skills in battle, using her saw to carve paths for the investigation team in the Twisted Lands.
Chinese:
手持圆锯的“猎人”，但在如今的时代似乎已经没有狩猎的必要。拥有可以在战斗中脱身的“替身”来应对不同情景的战场。
其自称“幽灵鲨”，在战斗中拥有惊人的破坏性与卓越的战斗技巧，用她的锯子在扭曲之地为调查团开辟道路。

English: May you stay awake even in your dreams.
Chinese: 祝你在梦中也能保持清醒。

English: Our definitions of danger likely differ.
Chinese: 我们之间对危险的定义恐怕并不相同

English: Things aren't as complicated as they seem.
Chinese: 事情，有时候其实没有那么复杂

English: ...Listen, the vast Lord of All, murmuring in the darkness...
Chinese: ......听，茫茫的万物之主，在黑暗中，喃喃自语......

English: The sculpture leaves a shadow, just as a coin has two sides, day and night divided. When both become aware of their duality, Laurentina possesses the most complete soul, akin to twin moons.
Chinese: 雕刻留下阴影，正如硬币正反，日夜双分。当彼此都意识到自我的两面性时，劳伦缇娜便拥有双月般最完整的灵魂。

English: [A]Are you joking, sir... Such things don't exist in this world.
Chinese: [A]先生在说笑吗...世上怎么会有那种东西呢。

English: [A]Thank you. Our leader has good taste in clothing.
Chinese: [A]谢谢，我们队长对服装的品味看来是很好。

English: [B]The power of black and white is so cool.
[A]It's just the color of the clothes, really.
Chinese: [A]其实只是服装颜色的区别哦。

English: [B]You're completely different when you go berserk.
Chinese: [B]你疯起来可和现在完全不是一个样子啊。

English: [B]Time for treatment! Why did you switch to Substitute...
Chinese: [B]来治疗啦！怎么切换为替身了...

English: [A]Between you and greatness lies only a lack of confidence.
Chinese: [A]你与强大之间，单单缺少了自信。

English: [B]With your Substitute, you don't need me to shield you anymore...
Chinese: [B]你有替身，好像也不需要我挡在前面了...
[A]没关系，其它调查员还需要你的帮助。

English: [A]Must a true elite always maintain this "elite" facade?
Chinese: [A]真正的精英，需要一直保持这副“精英”的模样吗。

English: [B]"Abyssal Hunter"? Technology far beyond our comprehension...
Chinese: [B]“深海猎人”吗？完全超出我们理解范畴的科技啊...

English: [A]This world has many mysteries too, doesn't it?
Chinese: [A]这个世界也有许多我们无法理解的地方，不是吗？

English: [A]Thank you. That's the highest praise for a hunter.
Chinese: [A]谢谢，这是对一个猎人最好的赞美。

English: [B]Switching to Substitute... It's like resurrection! So cool!
Chinese: [B]替换替身...看上去像死而复生了一样...好酷

English: [A]Want to learn? It's a hunter's technique.
Chinese: [A]想学吗。这也是猎人的技巧之一。

English: [B]You and your Substitute—which is the real you?
Chinese: [B]你和你的替身，那个是真正的你。

English: [A]Hmm... This existence resembles the Beast Lords...
[B]Not sure what you mean... But I am a divine beast!
Chinese: [B]虽然不知道你在说什么...但本大人的确是神兽哦。
[A]你们的神明会回应你们的祷告吗。

English: [B]Of course. I act by divine will.
Chinese: [B]当然，我循着神明的旨意行事。

English: [B]Is your Substitute your sister or a puppet?
[A]Another me—in a sense, my sister? Heh.
Chinese: [A]另一个我，某种意义上也是我的姐妹？呵呵。

English: [B]Using Substitute to draw aggro... Such veteran tactics.
Chinese: [B]能让替身帮忙吸引怪物，真是经验老道阿。
[A]这是属于猎人的生存法则，不是吗。

English: [B]Incredible physical prowess... This world is amazing.
Chinese: [B]好强大的身体素质...这个世界真是神奇啊。

English: [A]Though I'm from elsewhere too, your swords and armor differ greatly from Aegir's technology.
Chinese: [A]虽说我也是从其它地方来的，不过，你们的剑和铠甲，和阿戈尔的技术也有很大差别呢。

English: [B]Your combat style with the Substitute is like a dance! Let's spar, Specter!
Chinese: [B]好酷的战斗方式，和替身在场上像跳舞一样，幽灵鲨小姐，我们来切磋吧。

English: [A]I avoid wasting energy... But I'll make an exception this time.
Chinese: [A]虽然不想在无谓的地方浪费体力，但这一次，就算破例哦。
[A你很努力，你也一定会变得很强大。

English: [B]Thank you. I'll keep improving to catch up to my sisters.
Chinese: [B]谢谢，我会继续变强，追上姐姐她们。

English: [A]Saw you once on Rhodes Island. Interesting—when did you get this gear?
Chinese: [A]在罗德岛上见过你一次，有意思，你什么时候弄到的这套神奇的装备。
[B]机缘巧合之下吧，改用这种武器了。

English: [A]It's you... But in my world, you weren't like this...
Chinese: [A]是你...可是，不，在我的那个世界，你不是这个样子...

English: [B]Is that so? I recall you... You should be dead. Regardless, the Hivemind isn't here. We aren't enemies.
Chinese: [B]是这样吗，我对你们有印象，你应该已经死了...不管这些，这里没有大群，你也不必将我再当作敌人。

English: [B]Our shared goal is to find the Time Shard.
Chinese: [B]去找到时光之影，才是我们共同的目标。

English: If this card is in the deck, at the start of battle, lose 50% max HP, increase ATK by 20% for 2 turns.
Chinese: 若牌库中拥有这张牌，战斗开始时，失去50%maxhp%的体力值，提升攻击力20%（2t）

English: First, the ally with the highest HP takes equal damage. Then restore all HP limit. If targeting self, no damage is taken.
Chinese: 先使生命最高的友军受到等量伤害,恢复自身所有体力极限，若为自己，则不受到伤害。

English:
If the enemy does not have Hunt, apply 3 additional stacks. 
If they have Hunt, self takes 30% max HP as Pain damage.
Chinese:
若敌方未带有“追猎”，则额外附带三层“追猎”
若带有“追猎”，则自身受到30%maxhp的痛苦伤害

English:
If own HP percentage is higher than the enemy's, lose 30% max HP. Otherwise, deal an additional 40% ATK as Pain damage. 
Apply 3 Follow-up attacks (40% ATK) to enemies adjacent to the target, inflicting Hunt.
Chinese:
若自身生命值比例高于敌方，自身失去30%maxhp体力值，否则额外造成一次40%攻击力的痛苦伤害
对所选目标相邻两个敌人施加3次追击（40%倍率），附带“追猎”

English: Returns to hand after use, and take 50% max HP as Pain damage.
Chinese: 使用后回到手中，并受到50%maxhp的痛苦伤害。

English:
Deal additional damage equal to 300% of lost HP. 
If the enemy is killed, take 30% max HP as Pain damage.
Chinese:
对敌方额外造成自身已经损失生命值300%的伤害
若击杀敌人，自身受到30%maxhp的痛苦伤害

English:
Deal 10% ATK as Pain damage to all units. 
<color=#FFA636FF>Substitute</color>: Deal an additional 100% Pain damage to all enemies.
Chinese:
对所有单位造成10%攻击力的痛苦伤害
<color=#FFA636FF>替身</color>：对所有敌方再造成100%痛苦伤害

English:
For each stack of Hunt on the target, take 2 Pain damage. 
<color=#FFA636FF>Substitute</color>: Deal 150% Pain damage to the target.
Chinese:
根据目标附带的追猎层数，额外对自身造成等次数的2点痛苦伤害
<color=#FFA636FF>替身</color>：对目标造成150%倍率痛苦伤害

English:
Choose a skill in hand to create 2 copies. 
Cannot select rare or Lucy skills. 
<color=#FFA636FF>Substitute</color>: Deal 30% Pain damage per skill cost to random enemies.
Chinese:
选择手中的一个技能，生成2个相同的技能。
无法选择稀有技能和露西技能。
<color=#FFA636FF>替身</color>： 根据选中技能的费用对随机敌人造成等次的30%倍率痛苦伤害

English: Immediately exit Substitute state and refresh passive uses this turn.
Chinese: 立刻解除一次替身状态，并刷新本回合的被动使用次数

English: Draw 2 skills. Apply 1 stack of Hunt to all enemies.
Chinese: 抽取2个技能，为所有敌方添加一层“追猎”

English: Cost reduced by 1. After use, all allies take 1 Pain damage.
Chinese: 费用减少1点，使用后全队受到1点痛苦伤害

English: Gain Swiftness, Tracking, Critical. After use, take 4 Pain damage.
Chinese: 获得迅速，追踪，致命，使用后受到4点痛苦伤害

English:
Can be used while unable to act. 
If not in Substitute state, enter Substitute state when used. 
If in Substitute state, trigger the skill's special effect.
Chinese:
可以在无法行动时使用
使用时若自身不处于替身状态，进入替身状态
若处于替身状态，则触发技能的特殊效果
